amendment.description: Amendment provides funding for agricultural disaster assistance with offsets in the Conservation Security Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section providing additional funding for agricultural disaster assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
